bibl.title: Hesiod, Catalogue of Women 85+117.
bibl.note: Hesiod, Catalogue of Women frr. 85 (P. Oxy XXVIII, 2481 [= M.-P.3 516.4; LDAB 1216], fr. 12) and 117 (P. Oxy. XVII, 2075 [= M.-P.3 516; LDAB 1227], fr. 5) combine to form a single fragment.
bibl.seg: David Danbeck, Hesiod, Catalogue of Women 85+117.
Hesiod, Catalogue of Women frr. 85 (P. Oxy XXVIII, 2481 [= M.-P.3 516.4; LDAB 1216], fr. 12) and 117 (P. Oxy. XVII, 2075 [= M.-P.3 516; LDAB 1227], fr. 5) combine to form a single fragment.
